Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: NB #85 buses will operate via Central, Fullerton, Austin, and Diversey, then resume their normal route on Central. SB buses are not affected.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Northbound buses will operate via Central, Fullerton, Austin, and Diversey, then resume their normal route on Central.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to sewer work on Central between Fullerton and Diversey.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Monroe
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Jackson, Costner, Madison, and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Monroe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Jackson, Costner, Madison, and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Monroe.

Allow extra travel time.
